column4: how do i get the notification of updates back on my gnome bar
how do i get the notification of ubuntu updates back on my gnome bar i erased it
Sounds like you might have deleted your notification area panel applet. If so, you can right-click the panel and add it back.
i put that on there again but there's nothing there
how can i make it show me something :D any updates lately?
Open Synaptic and click the update icon (the two arrows)
oh ok i guess there hasn't been any updates today?
i haven't gotten any notification to install them
I haven't seen any updates today
